languages.text: {n}Мужчина неожиданно умолкает, словно чувствует ваше присутствие. Затем он произносит:{/n} "А вот и страждущие".
{n}The man falls abruptly silent, as though sensing your presence. Then he says,{/n} "And here come the afflicted."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина неожиданно умолкает, словно чувствует ваше присутствие. Затем он произносит:{/n} "А вот и страждущие".

{n}The man falls abruptly silent, as though sensing your presence. Then he says,{/n} "And here come the afflicted."

languages.text: {n}El hombre guarda silencio repentinamente, como su percibiera tu presencia. Después habla:{/n} «Aquí llegan los afligidos».
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls abruptly silent, as though sensing your presence. Then he says,{/n} "And here come the afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre guarda silencio repentinamente, como su percibiera tu presencia. Después habla:{/n} «Aquí llegan los afligidos».

languages.text: {n}那个人突然沉默下来，似乎感觉到了你的存在，之后开了口。{/n}“受难者来了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls abruptly silent, as though sensing your presence. Then he says,{/n} "And here come the afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}那个人突然沉默下来，似乎感觉到了你的存在，之后开了口。{/n}“受难者来了。”

languages.text: {n}まるでこちらの存在を感じ取ったように、男は突然黙り込んだ。そして口を開く。{/n}「苦しむ者が来たようだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls abruptly silent, as though sensing your presence. Then he says,{/n} "And here come the afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}まるでこちらの存在を感じ取ったように、男は突然黙り込んだ。そして口を開く。{/n}「苦しむ者が来たようだ」

languages.text: {n}Der Mann verstummt plötzlich, als spüre er deine Anwesenheit. Dann sagt er:{/n} "Und hier kommt {mf|der|die} Heimgesuchte."
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls abruptly silent, as though sensing your presence. Then he says,{/n} "And here come the afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann verstummt plötzlich, als spüre er deine Anwesenheit. Dann sagt er:{/n} "Und hier kommt {mf|der|die} Heimgesuchte."

languages.text: {n}L'homme se tait subitement, comme s'il avait senti votre présence, puis déclare :{/n} « Et voilà les souffrants. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls abruptly silent, as though sensing your presence. Then he says,{/n} "And here come the afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme se tait subitement, comme s'il avait senti votre présence, puis déclare :{/n} « Et voilà les souffrants. »

languages.text: {n}Adam, varlığını sezmişçesine aniden sessizliğe gömülüyor. Sonrasında konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Müteessirler sonunda teşrif etti."
languages.original_text: {n}The man falls abruptly silent, as though sensing your presence. Then he says,{/n} "And here come the afflicted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam, varlığını sezmişçesine aniden sessizliğe gömülüyor. Sonrasında konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Müteessirler sonunda teşrif etti."
